Mailing Address: c/o Canadian Mental Health Association504 Sutherland AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 5X1
Primary Contact: Mike Gawliuk, Director of Service Delivery and Program Innovation; Email: mike.gawliuk@cmha.bc.ca
Service Details: Provides low-cost, one-bedroom apartments for people with mental health issues living on limited incomes, who are able to live independently over the long term
How to Apply: - Please phone or visit our website to download an application form- Complete the form and return by fax, mail or in person- A waiting list is NOT maintained- As applications are only kept on file for 6 months after which they will be destroyed, please contact CMHA to verify that you would still like to be considered if a unit becomes available after 6 months
Address & Map: 540 Rosemead AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 5Z8View MapQuest Map
